sentences.sContent: Located near the base of the neck, the thyroid is a large endocrine gland that produces hormones that help control growth and metabolism.

sentences.sContent: Some of the chemicals that are all around us have the ability to interfere with our endocrine systems, which regulate the hormones that control our weight, our biorhythms and our reproduction.

sentences.sCn: 我们周围的某些化学物质会影响人体的内分泌系统——其作用是通过调节激素分泌从而控制体重、生理周期以及生殖能力。
